title: A Dog And A Kind-Hearted Boiler
description:
Description :
        [Translated by Mosh Scans x Cloud Scans]On his days off, thirty-year-old Kang Nakkyung volunteered at an animal shelter for abandoned dogs. Otherwise, he worked as a boiler repair technician, leading an utterly ordinary life. That was until he met twenty-four-year-old Nam Jiha, who loudly barged into his life, claiming to have fallen for him at first sight."I like you, hyung. Really. Don't abandon me.."
